Items.text: On its own, a hero cell cannot defeat a villain cell.
Items.name: Ms Sparks

Items.text: But, this is where we can do something interesting.
Items.name: Ms Sparks

Items.text: That beam in front of the cell is what we call an 'Exotron Emitter'
Items.name: Ms Sparks

Items.text: Exotrons, are in fact, the thing that gives us all our powers!
Items.name: Ms Sparks

Items.text: Walk the cell into the exotron beam and see what happens.
